metadata.title: CVE-2019-18388 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - low
metadata.description:
A NULL pointer dereference in vrend_renderer.c in virglrenderer through0.8.0 allows guest OS users to cause a denial of service via malformedcommands.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-18388` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libvirglrenderer1 - 0.8.1-6
virgl-server - 0.8.1-6
No subscription required

criterions.comment: virglrenderer package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.8.1-6').
